Name: Cheitha
About the game: From Headshot Labs, Cheitha is a competitive survival shooter. Overcome waves of enemies by unlocking new tiers of weapons and opening passageways to even the odds. Challenge your friends' scores on the leaderboard by surviving longer. Tactical Combat Enemies can surround and overwhelm you quickly. Know when to dodge, run, and angle your shot for maximum damage. This will be the key to your survival. Use kill points your earn to open up doors around the overrun facility to give yourself more room to run. Knowing when to conserve your kill points and when to spend them will be a determining factor in how long you last. Diverse Weapons Each time you play Cheitha youâ€™ll be find a different set of weapons stashed in ammo boxes around the facility. Try each weapon and find out which one best fits your playstyle. Leaderboards You can directly compete against any of your Steam friends by playing Cheitha and beat their score which is tracked in the HUD as you play.
